Name: Break The Food Chain
About the game: Break The Food Chain is an arcade game about cute little animals shooting at each other in the face like there is no tomorrow. Fight your way out of the food chain with with blades, bullets, bananas and lasers. A colourful cast of animals and machines will try to stop you with ever-increasing numbers and heavier weaponry at their disposal. Features: + Over 20 challenging levels with various, traps, bosses and enemy types and increasing difficulty. + A large arsenal of weapons ranging from cleavers and laser rifles to rocket launchers and auto shotguns. + 8 Playable characters with their own unique playstyles and abilities. + An upgrade system that will give you the upper hand in the way that you see fit. + Adorable Pixel Art and a chiptune soundtrack.
